018package com.scivicslab.actoriac.plugins.transitionviewer;
019
020import com.scivicslab.actoriac.log.DistributedLogStore;
021import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.core.ActionResult;
022import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.core.CallableByActionName;
023import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.workflow.ActorSystemAware;
024import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.workflow.IIActorRef;
025import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.workflow.IIActorSystem;
026
027import org.json.JSONObject;
028
029import java.sql.Connection;
030import java.sql.PreparedStatement;
031import java.sql.ResultSet;
032import java.sql.Timestamp;
033import java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter;
034import java.util.ArrayList;
035import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
036import java.util.List;
037import java.util.Map;
038import java.util.logging.Logger;
039
040/**
041 * ワークフロー実行時に記録されたTransition履歴を表示するプラグイン。
042 *
043 * <p>指定したアクター（ノードまたはNodeGroup）のTransition履歴を
044 * データベースから取得し、人間が読みやすい形式で出力する。</p>
045 *
046 * <h2>アクション:</h2>
047 * <ul>
048 *   <li>{@code showTransitions} - 指定アクターのTransition履歴を表示</li>
049 * </ul>
050 *
051 * <h2>使用例（ワークフロー）:</h2>
052 * <pre>{@code
053 * - actor: loader
054 *   method: createChild
055 *   arguments: ["ROOT", "transitionViewer", "com.scivicslab.actoriac.plugins.transitionviewer.TransitionViewerPlugin"]
056 * - actor: transitionViewer
057 *   method: showTransitions
058 *   arguments:
059 *     target: "node-localhost"
060 * }</pre>
061 *
062 * @author devteam@scivicslab.com
063 * @since 2.15.0
064 */
065public class TransitionViewerPlugin implements CallableByActionName, ActorSystemAware {
066
067    private static final String CLASS_NAME = TransitionViewerPlugin.class.getName();
068    private static final Logger logger = Logger.getLogger(CLASS_NAME);
069    private static final DateTimeFormatter TIME_FORMAT = DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss");
070
071    private IIActorSystem system;
072    private Connection connection;
073
074    /**
075     * デフォルトコンストラクタ。loader.createChildで使用される。
076     */
077    public TransitionViewerPlugin() {
078        initConnection();
079    }
080
081    private void initConnection() {
082        DistributedLogStore logStore = DistributedLogStore.getInstance();
083        if (logStore != null) {
084            this.connection = logStore.getConnection();
085            logger.fine("TransitionViewerPlugin: Initialized database connection");
086        }
087    }
088
089    @Override
090    public void setActorSystem(IIActorSystem system) {
091        this.system = system;
092        logger.fine("TransitionViewerPlugin: ActorSystem set");
093    }
094
095    /**
096     * テスト用にデータベース接続を設定する。
097     */
098    public void setConnection(Connection connection) {
099        this.connection = connection;
100    }
101
102    @Override
103    public ActionResult callByActionName(String actionName, String args) {
104        logger.info("TransitionViewerPlugin.callByActionName: " + actionName);
105
106        return switch (actionName) {
107            case "showTransitions" -> showTransitions(args);
108            default -> new ActionResult(false, "Unknown action: " + actionName);
109        };
110    }
111
112    /**
113     * 指定されたアクターのTransition履歴を表示する。
114     *
115     * @param args JSON形式の引数
116     *   - target: アクター名（必須）
117     *   - session: セッションID（省略時は最新）
118     *   - includeChildren: trueの場合、配下ノードも含める
119     */
120    private ActionResult showTransitions(String args) {
121        if (connection == null) {
122            return new ActionResult(false, "Database connection not available");
123        }
124
125        String target;
126        long sessionId = -1;
127        boolean includeChildren = false;
128
129        try {
130            JSONObject json = new JSONObject(args);
131            target = json.getString("target");
132            sessionId = json.optLong("session", -1);
133            includeChildren = json.optBoolean("includeChildren", false);
134        } catch (Exception e) {
135            return new ActionResult(false, "Invalid arguments: " + e.getMessage() +
136                ". Expected: {\"target\": \"actor-name\", \"session\": optional, \"includeChildren\": optional}");
137        }
138
139        // セッションIDが指定されていなければnodeGroupから取得
140        if (sessionId < 0) {
141            try {
142                sessionId = getSessionIdFromNodeGroup();
143            } catch (Exception e) {
144                return new ActionResult(false, "Could not get session ID: " + e.getMessage());
145            }
146        }
147
148        try {
149            String output;
150            if (includeChildren && "nodeGroup".equals(target)) {
151                output = buildAggregatedOutput(sessionId);
152            } else {
153                output = buildSingleActorOutput(target, sessionId);
154            }
155
156            outputToMultiplexer(output);
157            return new ActionResult(true, output);
158
159        } catch (Exception e) {
160            logger.warning("TransitionViewerPlugin.showTransitions: " + e.getMessage());
161            return new ActionResult(false, "Error: " + e.getMessage());
162        }
163    }
164
165    /**
166     * 単一アクターのTransition履歴を構築する。
167     */
168    private String buildSingleActorOutput(String source, long sessionId) throws Exception {
169        List<TransitionEntry> entries = queryTransitions(source, sessionId);
170        String workflowName = querySessionWorkflowName(sessionId);
171
172        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
173        sb.append("=== Transition History ===\n");
174        if (workflowName != null && !workflowName.isEmpty()) {
175            sb.append("Workflow: ").append(workflowName).append("\n");
176        }
177        sb.append("Session: ").append(sessionId).append("\n");
178        sb.append("Target: ").append(source).append("\n\n");
179
180        int succeeded = 0;
181        int failed = 0;
182
183        for (TransitionEntry entry : entries) {
184            sb.append(entry.success ? "o " : "x ");
185            sb.append("[").append(entry.timestamp).append("] ");
186            sb.append(entry.label);
187            if (entry.note != null && !entry.note.isEmpty()) {
188                sb.append(" [").append(entry.note).append("]");
189            }
190            if (entry.success) {
191                sb.append("\n");
192                succeeded++;
193            } else {
194                if (entry.errorMessage != null && !entry.errorMessage.isEmpty()) {
195                    sb.append(" ").append(entry.errorMessage);
196                }
197                sb.append("\n");
198                failed++;
199            }
200        }
201
202        sb.append("\nSummary: ").append(entries.size()).append(" transitions, ");
203        sb.append(succeeded).append(" succeeded, ").append(failed).append(" failed");
204
205        return sb.toString();
206    }
207
208    /**
209     * NodeGroupと配下ノードの集約出力を構築する。
210     */
211    private String buildAggregatedOutput(long sessionId) throws Exception {
212        // セッション内の全アクターを取得
213        List<String> sources = queryDistinctSources(sessionId);
214        String workflowName = querySessionWorkflowName(sessionId);
215
216        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
217        sb.append("=== Transition History ===\n");
218        if (workflowName != null && !workflowName.isEmpty()) {
219            sb.append("Workflow: ").append(workflowName).append("\n");
220        }
221        sb.append("Session: ").append(sessionId).append("\n");
222        sb.append("Target: nodeGroup (with children)\n");
223
224        int totalTransitions = 0;
225        int totalSucceeded = 0;
226        int totalFailed = 0;
227
228        for (String source : sources) {
229            List<TransitionEntry> entries = queryTransitions(source, sessionId);
230            if (entries.isEmpty()) continue;
231
232            sb.append("\n[").append(source).append("]\n");
233
234            for (TransitionEntry entry : entries) {
235                sb.append("  ").append(entry.success ? "o " : "x ");
236                sb.append("[").append(entry.timestamp).append("] ");
237                sb.append(entry.label);
238                if (entry.note != null && !entry.note.isEmpty()) {
239                    sb.append(" [").append(entry.note).append("]");
240                }
241                if (entry.success) {
242                    sb.append("\n");
243                    totalSucceeded++;
244                } else {
245                    if (entry.errorMessage != null && !entry.errorMessage.isEmpty()) {
246                        sb.append(" ").append(entry.errorMessage);
247                    }
248                    sb.append("\n");
249                    totalFailed++;
250                }
251                totalTransitions++;
252            }
253        }
254
255        sb.append("\nSummary: ").append(totalTransitions).append(" transitions, ");
256        sb.append(totalSucceeded).append(" succeeded, ").append(totalFailed).append(" failed");
257
258        return sb.toString();
259    }
260
261    /**
262     * 指定アクターのTransitionログをクエリする。
263     */
264    private List<TransitionEntry> queryTransitions(String source, long sessionId) throws Exception {
265        List<TransitionEntry> entries = new ArrayList<>();
266
267        String sql = "SELECT timestamp, label, level, message FROM logs " +
268                     "WHERE session_id = ? AND node_id = ? AND message LIKE '%Transition %' " +
269                     "ORDER BY timestamp";
270
271        try (PreparedStatement ps = connection.prepareStatement(sql)) {
272            ps.setLong(1, sessionId);
273            ps.setString(2, source);
274
275            try (ResultSet rs = ps.executeQuery()) {
276                while (rs.next()) {
277                    Timestamp ts = rs.getTimestamp("timestamp");
278                    String label = rs.getString("label");
279                    String message = rs.getString("message");
280
281                    boolean success = message.contains("SUCCESS");
282                    String errorMessage = null;
283                    if (!success) {
284                        int dashIdx = message.indexOf(" - ");
285                        if (dashIdx > 0) {
286                            errorMessage = message.substring(dashIdx + 3);
287                        }
288                    }
289
290                    // messageから状態遷移とnoteを抽出
291                    String[] transitionAndNote = extractTransitionAndNote(message);
292                    String transition = transitionAndNote[0];
293                    String note = transitionAndNote[1];
294
295                    // labelが意味のある状態遷移でない場合はmessageから抽出した値を使用
296                    String displayLabel = (label != null && label.contains("->")) ? label : transition;
297
298                    String timeStr = ts.toLocalDateTime().format(TIME_FORMAT);
299                    entries.add(new TransitionEntry(timeStr, displayLabel, note, success, errorMessage));
300                }
301            }
302        }
303
304        return entries;
305    }
306
307    /**
308     * セッション内でTransitionを記録した全アクターを取得する。
309     */
310    private List<String> queryDistinctSources(long sessionId) throws Exception {
311        List<String> sources = new ArrayList<>();
312
313        String sql = "SELECT DISTINCT node_id FROM logs " +
314                     "WHERE session_id = ? AND message LIKE '%Transition %' " +
315                     "ORDER BY node_id";
316
317        try (PreparedStatement ps = connection.prepareStatement(sql)) {
318            ps.setLong(1, sessionId);
319
320            try (ResultSet rs = ps.executeQuery()) {
321                while (rs.next()) {
322                    sources.add(rs.getString("node_id"));
323                }
324            }
325        }
326
327        return sources;
328    }
329
330    /**
331     * セッションIDからワークフロー名を取得する。
332     */
333    private String querySessionWorkflowName(long sessionId) throws Exception {
334        String sql = "SELECT workflow_name FROM sessions WHERE id = ?";
335
336        try (PreparedStatement ps = connection.prepareStatement(sql)) {
337            ps.setLong(1, sessionId);
338
339            try (ResultSet rs = ps.executeQuery()) {
340                if (rs.next()) {
341                    return rs.getString("workflow_name");
342                }
343            }
344        }
345
346        return null;
347    }
348
349    private long getSessionIdFromNodeGroup() {
350        if (system == null) {
351            throw new RuntimeException("ActorSystem not set");
352        }
353
354        IIActorRef<?> nodeGroup = system.getIIActor("nodeGroup");
355        if (nodeGroup == null) {
356            throw new RuntimeException("nodeGroup not found");
357        }
358
359        ActionResult result = nodeGroup.callByActionName("getSessionId", "");
360        if (!result.isSuccess()) {
361            throw new RuntimeException("Could not get session ID from nodeGroup");
362        }
363
364        return Long.parseLong(result.getResult());
365    }
366
367    /**
368     * messageから状態遷移とnoteを抽出する。
369     * 例: "Transition SUCCESS: 0 -> 1" → ["0 -> 1", ""]
370     * 例: "Transition SUCCESS: 0 -> 1 [Collect info]" → ["0 -> 1", "Collect info"]
371     * 例: "[node-localhost] Transition SUCCESS: 1 -> 2 [Process data]" → ["1 -> 2", "Process data"]
372     *
373     * @return String[2] where [0]=transition, [1]=note
374     */
375    private String[] extractTransitionAndNote(String message) {
376        if (message == null) return new String[]{"unknown", ""};
377
378        // "Transition SUCCESS: X -> Y" または "Transition FAILED: X -> Y" のパターン
379        int idx = message.indexOf("Transition ");
380        if (idx < 0) return new String[]{"unknown", ""};
381
382        String afterTransition = message.substring(idx + "Transition ".length());
383        // "SUCCESS: 0 -> 1 [note]" or "FAILED: 0 -> 1 [note] - error message"
384        int colonIdx = afterTransition.indexOf(": ");
385        if (colonIdx < 0) return new String[]{"unknown", ""};
386
387        String statesPart = afterTransition.substring(colonIdx + 2);
388
389        // noteを抽出 [xxx]
390        String note = "";
391        int bracketStart = statesPart.indexOf(" [");
392        int bracketEnd = statesPart.indexOf("]");
393        if (bracketStart > 0 && bracketEnd > bracketStart) {
394            note = statesPart.substring(bracketStart + 2, bracketEnd);
395            statesPart = statesPart.substring(0, bracketStart);
396        }
397
398        // " - error message" があれば除去
399        int dashIdx = statesPart.indexOf(" - ");
400        if (dashIdx > 0) {
401            statesPart = statesPart.substring(0, dashIdx);
402        }
403
404        return new String[]{statesPart.trim(), note};
405    }
406
407    /**
408     * 後方互換性のためのラッパー
409     */
410    private String extractTransition(String message) {
411        return extractTransitionAndNote(message)[0];
412    }
413
414    private void outputToMultiplexer(String data) {
415        if (system == null) return;
416
417        IIActorRef<?> multiplexer = system.getIIActor("outputMultiplexer");
418        if (multiplexer == null) return;
419
420        JSONObject arg = new JSONObject();
421        arg.put("source", "transition-viewer");
422        arg.put("type", "plugin-result");
423        arg.put("data", data);
424        multiplexer.callByActionName("add", arg.toString());
425    }
426
427    /**
428     * Transition履歴エントリ。
429     */
430    private static class TransitionEntry {
431        final String timestamp;
432        final String label;
433        final String note;
434        final boolean success;
435        final String errorMessage;
436
437        TransitionEntry(String timestamp, String label, String note, boolean success, String errorMessage) {
438            this.timestamp = timestamp;
439            this.label = label;
440            this.note = note;
441            this.success = success;
442            this.errorMessage = errorMessage;
443        }
444    }
445}
